CustomField.description: Stamped with 'Calculated Change in % Share' when Approved. If type = 'SSS Update,' stamped with value of 'System Change Percent Share' - 'Previous % Share.' We need a static field for tracking purposes and to use in Rollup summary fields.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Stamped with 'Calculated Change in % Share' when Approved. If type = 'SSS Update,' stamped with value of 'System Change Percent Share' - 'Previous % Share.' We need a static field for tracking purposes and to use in Rollup summary fields.
CustomField.label: Approved Change in Percent Share
